title: Payment page: remove Copy Link and update primary UPI button label/size

requirements.summary: Remove the secondary Copy Link action and all related copy-to-clipboard UI/state from the payment page.
acceptanceCriteria: On the payment page, the "Copy Link" button is not rendered.
The UI no longer imports or displays the Copy icon, and no copy status text (e.g., "Link Copied!" / "Copy Link") appears.
Any unused React state/handlers related to copying (e.g., copyStatus, handleCopyLink) are removed from PaymentPage.tsx without TypeScript/lint errors.

file_operations.description: Update the payment page UI to remove the secondary "Copy Link" Button and its copy-to-clipboard logic (remove useState/copyStatus, handleCopyLink, and related conditional copy-status label). Also remove the unused lucide-react Copy icon import and any copy-related messaging. The page continues to use shadcn-ui components (Button, Card, Badge, Separator) for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make the primary UPI button larger and change its label to "GET PRIMIUM" while preserving the existing UPI deep link behavior and amount.
acceptanceCriteria: The primary button label reads exactly "GET PRIMIUM".
The primary button is visually larger than before (e.g., increased height/padding and/or font size) while remaining full-width and consistent with the page theme.
Clicking the primary button still navigates to the existing UPI URI: upi://pay?pa=paytm.s1x87m2@pty&am=99&cu=INR&tn=Verified Merchant Account.
Any instructional text referencing copying a link is updated/removed so it no longer mentions copying.

file_operations.description: Adjust the primary UPI Button to be visually larger via Tailwind className overrides (e.g., increased height/padding and font size) without editing read-only files under frontend/src/components/ui. Change the button text from "Pay via UPI" to exactly "GET PRIMIUM" and keep the existing onClick behavior that navigates to the unchanged UPI_URI (including am=99). Update the instruction copy to remove any mention of copying a link. Continue using shadcn-ui Button for layout/theme consistency; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
